description:
Updated with a narrow, kid-grip friendly profile, these bottles are as great as they’ve always been, just easier for little ones to hold onto. Keep young explorers hydrated on family hikes, road trips and beach days. A great alternative to aluminum or plastic, the Kid Kanteen Sport is made of food-grade stainless steel with a chip-resistant finish to help it stand up to being tossed onto rocky beaches or soccer sidelines.

  • Sport cap for easy sipping on the go
  • Sport cap now has a removeable silicone mouthpiece, making cleaning easy
  • Klean Coat™ chip-resistant, powder coat finish is more durable than ever. Using the chemical hazard assessment known as GreenSceen®, Klean Kanteen developed a formulation that is safer for people and the planet
  • Made of 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that's easy to keep clean
  • Volume is enough to hydrate without being so heavy that kids are unwilling to carry it
  • Brushed bottles are dishwasher safe, but painted bottles should be hand-washed
name: Klean Kanteen SW KidKanteen SportCap 355ml
